name: Focal
headline: AI video creation tool for TV shows and movies
description:
Focal is an AI video creation tool that allows anyone to create and share TV episodes and movies. We combine existing video, audio, and language models to make this process simple and straightforward.

Check out our most recent demo: https://youtu.be/GFaN96OMlb0

founders.name: Robert Cunningham, Founder
founders.description: Building Focal, an AI video creation tool that allows anyone to create and share TV episodes and movies. Previously math and physics at MIT.

founders.name: Felix Wang, Founder
founders.description: Building Focal, an AI video creation tool that allows anyone to create and share TV episodes and movies. Previously math and CS at Stanford.

raw_markdown='[![](https://focalml.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ficon.63daf05c.png&w=640&q=75)Focal](https://focalml.com/</>)[Get Started](https://focalml.com/</sign-up?redirect_url=https://focalml.com/projects>)
# Make Your Own Movies
Focal is online video creation software that helps you tell stories using AI.
3m
Narration
Template
English
or start from a script
The Battle of Leyte Gulf
The Hijacking of Indian Airlines Flight 405
How Does Bitcoin Actually Work?
The Rise of the Red Dragon: Episode 1
![focal screenshot](https://focalml.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffocal%20preview%203.9c84c07d.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
## Features
#### Tell long stories with AI
### Generate from a Script
Bring your own script, and Focal will adapt it faithfully. Just an idea? We can help you turn it into a script first.
### Edit with Chat
Edit your script with commands like "Make this conversation shorter" or "replace this with a series of over-the-shoulder shots aimed at the person who is speaking."
### Precise Control
We support the traditional timeline editing tools you need to polish your work.
### Latest models
We provide all the features of the latest models, like video extension, frame interpolation, and more.
## Demo
#### See what others have been making
![Hero Video](https://focalml.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcanned%20fury%20preview.2a528d02.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
## FAQ
#### Frequently Asked Questions
### Which models does Focal support?
Focal integrates best-in-class models for videos, images, and voices. For videos, we support Minimax, Kling, Luma, and Runway. For images, we support Flux1.1 Pro, Flux Dev, and Flux Schnell. For voices and sound effects, we support ElevenLabs.
### Are there any discounts available?
If you would like to do a project with Focal but cannot afford these prices, we occasionally sponsor projects. Please reach out to us at founders@focalml.com.
### Do you support consistent characters and locations?
Yes. You can generate and re-use characters and locations in your projects.
### Can I use my outputs commercially?
Anything you make on a paid plan is yours to use commercially. The free plan is for personal use only.
### I have another question. How do I get in touch?
You can talk directly to us through the Support button (in the top right corner) or reach out to us at founders@focalml.com.
## Pricing
#### Choose the perfect plan for your needs
### Free
A small sample for sparking your creativity
$NaN/month
  * NaN initial credits
  * NaN daily credits when initial credits run out
  * Access to the best models
  * Generate up to NaN seconds of video
  * Videos are watermarked
  * No commercial use


Sign Up
### Starter
Tell your story with a few extra credits
$10/month
  * 1000 monthly credits
  * 50 daily credits when monthly credits run out
  * Access to the best models
  * Generate up to 250 seconds of video per month
  * No watermarks
  * Commercial use


Subscribe Now
### Standard
Unlock your imagination with additional credits
$30/month
Most Popular
  * 3900 monthly credits
  * 50 daily credits when monthly credits run out
  * Access to the best models
  * Generate up to 16 minutes of video per month
  * No watermarks
  * Commercial use


Subscribe Now
### Pro
Craft a masterpiece with ample credits
$100/month
  * 15000 monthly credits
  * 50 daily credits when monthly credits run out
  * Access to the best models
  * Generate up to 62 minutes of video per month
  * No watermarks
  * Commercial use


Subscribe Now
## Ready to get started?
#### Start making movies today.
Focal makes it much faster to produce content with the latest AI models.
[Get Started](https://focalml.com/</sign-up?redirect_url=https://focalml.com/projects> "Click to get started")Contact Us
### Product
  * [Pricing](https://focalml.com/<#pricing> "View Pricing")
  * [Demos](https://focalml.com/<#demo> "View Demos")
  * [FAQ](https://focalml.com/<#faq> "View FAQ")


### Resources
  * [Tutorials](https://focalml.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/@FocalML> "View Tutorials")
  * [Community](https://focalml.com/<https:/discord.com/invite/6vACjMkzrC> "View Community")
  * Support


### Company

  * Contact


### Connect

generated_description:
**Focal: Simplifying Video Creation with AI**

Focal is an innovative startup launched in 2023 that aims to revolutionize video production for amateurs and professionals alike. Based in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, Focal has created a user-friendly platform that empowers anyone to craft their own TV shows and movies using cutting-edge artificial intelligence tools.

**Mission and Offerings**

At its core, Focal’s mission is to enable storytelling through AI video creation. The platform simplifies the production process by allowing users to combine existing video, audio, and language models. Users can start from scratch with their own scripts or leverage predefined templates to bring their ideas to life. With Focal, creating compelling visual narratives isn’t just for established filmmakers—it’s accessible to everyone.

**Core Features**

1. **Script Generation and Editing**: Users can either upload their scripts or generate one based on a basic idea. Focal also streamlines the editing process with intuitive commands to refine dialogue and shots.

2. **Comprehensive Control**: The platform supports traditional timeline editing, meaning users can achieve precise control over their final products while taking advantage of the latest models in video technology.

3. **Great for Collaboration**: Consistent characters and settings can be easily reused across projects, fostering both creativity and continuity.

4. **Commercial Use**: Content generated on a paid plan is available for commercial use, allowing users to monetize their creations if desired.

**Pricing Plans**

Focal offers several pricing tiers to cater to different user needs:

- **Free Tier**: A basic option for personal projects with limited features.
- **Starter Plan ($10/month)**: Offers additional credits and the ability to create up to 250 seconds of video without watermarks.
- **Standard Plan ($30/month)** (Most Popular): Allows for longer videos and more credits, ideal for storytelling without the constraints of watermarks.
- **Pro Plan ($100/month)**: Maximum credits and video length, perfect for professionals aiming to craft extensive content.

You can start exploring and creating today at [Focal](https://focalml.com).

**The Team**

Focal is a lean operation, with just two employees at the moment, mentored by Group Partner Michael Seibel from Y Combinator. This small team is laser-focused on making video content creation accessible and efficient for anyone with a story to tell.

**Final Thoughts**

Focal is not just another video editing tool; it’s a gateway to unleashing creativity through storytelling. Whether you’re a budding filmmaker or just someone with a story, Focal provides the necessary tools to make your visions a reality.

For a closer look at Focal's capabilities, check out their latest demo [here](https://youtu.be/GFaN96OMlb0).
